directions.dialogText: We are going to make buttons to play the Magic Words game. Inside the \`()\`s of \`setButton()\`, type \`0, iceButton\`. Then inside the \`{ }\`s of the \`iceButton()\` function, type \`cast('ice')\`.

levels.mission: On line 1, inside the \`()\`s of \`setButton()\`, type \`0, iceButton\`. Then on line 4, inside the \`{ }\`s of the \`iceButton()\` function, type \`cast('ice')\`.
levels.tools:
\`setButton(number, function)\`- set a button to call a function

\`cast('ice')\`- shoot ice at fire

\`cast('fire')\`- shoot fire at ice

\`foo()\`- toggle foo gates

\`boo()\`- toggle boo gates

\`goo()\`- toggle goo gates

\`loo()\`- toggle loo gates

directions.dialogText: Great start! Let's keep going. Set button 1 to be a \`fireButton\` and then define a \`fireButton()\` function that calls \`cast('fire')\`.

levels.mission: On line 2, type \`setButton(1, fireButton);\`. Then on line 8, type \`function fireButton(){}\`. Using the RETURN/ENTER button to create a new line between the \`{ }\`s, type \`cast('fire')\`.
levels.tools:
\`setButton(number, function)\`- set a button to call a function

\`cast('ice')\`- shoot ice at fire

\`cast('fire')\`- shoot fire at ice

\`foo()\`- toggle foo gates

\`boo()\`- toggle boo gates

\`goo()\`- toggle goo gates

\`loo()\`- toggle loo gates

directions.dialogText: Ok! Now let's start adding gates. Set button 2 to be a \`fooButton\` and then define a \`fooButton()\` function that calls \`foo();\`.

levels.mission: On line 3, type \`setButton(2, fooButton);\`. Then on line 13, type \`function fooButton(){}\`. Using the RETURN/ENTER button to create a new line between the \`{ }\`s, type \`foo();\`.
levels.tools:
\`setButton(number, function)\`- set a button to call a function

\`cast('ice');\`- shoot ice at fire

\`cast('fire');\`- shoot fire at ice

\`foo()\`- toggle foo gates

\`boo()\`- toggle boo gates

\`goo()\`- toggle goo gates

\`loo()\`- toggle loo gates

directions.dialogText: Ok! Let's keep going. Set button 3 to be a \`booButton\` and then define a \`booButton()\` function that calls \`boo();\`.

levels.mission: On line 4, type \`setButton(3, booButton);\`. Then on line 18, type \`function booButton(){}\`. Using RETURN or ENTER to create a new line between the \`{ }\`s, type \`boo();\`.
levels.tools:
\`setButton(number, function)\`- set a button to call a function

\`cast('ice');\`- shoot ice at fire

\`cast('fire');\`- shoot fire at ice

\`foo()\`- toggle foo gates

\`boo()\`- toggle boo gates

\`goo()\`- toggle goo gates

\`loo()\`- toggle loo gates

directions.dialogText: Ok! Only two more to go. Set button 4 to be a \`gooButton\` and then define a \`gooButton()\` function that calls \`goo();\`.

levels.mission: On line 5, type \`setButton(4, gooButton);\`. Then on line 23, type \`function gooButton(){}\`. Using RETURN or ENTER to create a new line between the \`{ }\`s, type \`goo();\`.
levels.tools:
\`setButton(number, function)\`- set a button to call a function

\`cast('ice');\`- shoot ice at fire

\`cast('fire');\`- shoot fire at ice

\`foo()\`- toggle foo gates

\`boo()\`- toggle boo gates

\`goo()\`- toggle goo gates

\`loo()\`- toggle loo gates

directions.dialogText: Ok! LAST BUTTON! Set button 5 to be a \`looButton\` and then define a \`looButton()\` function that calls \`loo();\`.

levels.mission: On line 6, type \`setButton(5, looButton);\`. Then on line 28, type \`function looButton(){}\`. Using RETURN or ENTER to create a new line between the \`{ }\`s, type \`loo();\`.

quiz.text: Which choice below would create the variable \`fruit\` and give it a value of \`9\`?
If the variable \`brownies\` has a value of \`4\` and the variable \`cookies\` has a value of \`6\`, which choice below would have a value of \`10\`?
Which would make a variable \`doughnuts\` and give it a value of the sum of \`chocolate\` and \`sprinkles\`?
Which choice would give the variable \`number\` a value of \`12\`?

directions.dialogText: That's it! You've written all the code you need. From now on, just RUN the code and use the buttons to free the wizard!

levels.mission: Run the code and use the buttons to free the wizard.
levels.tools:
\`setButton(number, function)\`- set a button to call a function

\`cast('ice');\`- shoot ice at fire

\`cast('fire');\`- shoot fire at ice

\`foo()\`- toggle foo gates

\`boo()\`- toggle boo gates

\`goo()\`- toggle goo gates

\`loo()\`- toggle loo gates
levels.tips: You must open any gates between the wizard and a fire or ice obstacle.
